name: places/ChIJmw2ARAv3wokRKHiw11GqRcQ
adrFormatAddress: 1365 5th Ave #19f, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: I highly recommend this family daycare. As a single parent of four, I was a bit nervous at first. Before my son even started, we did a home visit and he was very comfortable right from the start. Soon as I met Michelle, I knew my son would be in good hands. She always maintained communication with me and would send pictures of daily activities and interactions. During the summer and weather permitting, they go outside for outdoors play. She ensures the children are kept occupied and many of the activities involve building their motor and sensory skills. My son would always come home happy telling me about his day. Birthdays are celebrated and different holidays involve related activities. My son started throughout the pandemic and will now be moving to pre-k. I even enrolled my son in the same school her son attends. Michelle is very kind and nurturing. She treats all the children as if they are her own. I was very much at ease right from the beginning and satisfied with her services. Will recommend to anyone looking for family childcare in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: My son use to attend this daycare. They have holiday parties and birthday parties. They have their teaching moments and their dance moments as well. They are so friendly and warm hearted it made my heart melt. Always there for my son and me, I will never forget them. They always attend to my son needs as best as possible and always gave him, his nice fresh homemade food.  He loved every bit of it I may say. LOL, It was sad to leave, but that time always comes and our little ones all group up. I recommend them a lot to every parent out there. We need to work and provide for our family and it’s hard to trust someone with our precious little ones. Michelle and Nona are two beautiful and wonderful woman that will take good care of your little once.They not just a daycare but they will become part of your family to your little one and you. Love you guys.

originalText.text: We were so lucky to find The Explorers Daycare to look after our 2 babies. Michelle is extremely adorable. The daycare has all kind of toys, games and everything babies, infants and toddlers can dream of when spending a great day with their buddies. Cleanliness is always important, but even more so Michelle ’s place excels in that regard. But what is most important is Michelle herself, and the lovely way she connects with the kids, always learning new things and meanings. Having met Michelle has been an extraordinary source of support for my sons and ourselves these last months: we were sure they were in a safe, warm and stimulating environment. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Best daycare in the neighborhood. The caretakers are amazing. If you are looking for a Bi-lingual (English/Spanish) daycare, then this is the one for you and your child. This center dedicates time to teaching and learning each child's need. They pride themselves in keeping a very clean environment and to top it off, they offer great food. My daughter and I love the Little Explorers Daycare.

originalText.text:
Best daycare ever!
As a mom is very hard to find a place where you can trust the care of your kids, but this place is amazing. The staff is so caring and professional.
